Book.Comment: A must read book if you want to learn design patterns! Very easy to read!

Chapter.ChapterTitle: Welcome to Design Patterns: an introduction
Keeping your Objects in the know: the Observer Pattern

Article.DocumentTitle: Flexible Mixture Model for Collaborative Filtering

Notes.BookNote: Separating what changes from what stays the same.
Notes.ArticleNote: FMM extends existing partitioning/clustering algorithms for collaborative filtering by clustering both users and items together simultaneously without assuming that each user and item should only belong to a single cluster. This is the second line of note text.
